product_name: One Ball Jay F-1 All-Temp Rub-On Snowboard Wax
long_description: This generous tub of all-temperature wax includes an attached cork pad for fast application to get you back on the snow and in the air. Low-fluoro base with PTFE additive makes this wax ideal for lower humidity (25% or below) conditions.
short_description: This generous tub of all-temperature wax includes an attached cork pad for fast application to get you back on the snow and in the air.
